an3.48:4.1: “Himavantaṃ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṃ nissāya mahāsālā tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:4.3: Sākhāpattapalāsena vaḍḍhanti, tacapapaṭikāya vaḍḍhanti, pheggusārena vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:4.4: Himavantaṃ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṃ nissāya mahāsālā imāhi tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saddhaṃ kulapatiṃ nissāya anto jano tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhati.
an3.48:5.3: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena vaḍḍhati, paññāya vaḍḍhati.
an3.48:5.4: Saddhaṃ, bhikkhave, kulapatiṃ nissāya anto jano imāhi tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhatīti.
an3.48:8.4: attamatthaṃ vicakkhaṇā.
